definition: an occupation requiring special education (especially in the liberal arts or sciences)
details:
noun
- an occupation requiring special education (especially in the liberal arts or sciences)
- affirmation of acceptance of some religion or faith
= example: affirmation of acceptance of some religion or faith
- an open avowal (true or false) of some belief or opinion
= example: an open avowal (true or false) of some belief or opinion
= synonyms: professing
- the body of people in a learned occupation
= example: the body of people in a learned occupation
